name: Codeword Arguseye
overview: A classic text adventure with the usual verb-subject-input (Open Door, Get key, N, I, Help). Additionally, beautiful hires-colour-graphics will be loaded from disk, which just takes some seconds because of a built-in turbo loader. An introduction to the story will be given to you at the beginning of the game. Notes 1. It is necessary to include the hyphen in inputs, ie. GOLDEN-WATCH or MAGNET-CARD. 2. This solution is for the revised version, as in the original it was impossible to land the dinghy and bribing the guard crashed the game. 3. The word PROGRAMM must be spelt with two m's.
